thread.title: Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games
thread.title_full: Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games

title: Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games
text: > Pennsylvania Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games FILE - In this July 28, 2012, file photo, Canada's Ryan Cochrane reacts following his race in the men's 400 meter freestyle heat at the 2012 Olympics in London. "The depression that comes after the Olympics, I would say at least 75 percent of the athletes have it at some point," Canadian swimmer Ryan Cochrane said. "Before Beijing, that's all I talked about, every conversation was about Beijing, and as soon as it was over, I almost didn't even know how to have a normal conversation." (AP Photo/The Canadian Press, Sean Kilpatrick, File)
